amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill for carrying out the non-needs based school breakfast pilot program, established as a part of the William F. Goodling Child Nutrition Reauthorization Act of 1998.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill for carrying out the non-needs based school breakfast pilot program, established as a part of the William F. Goodling Child Nutrition Reauthorization Act of 1998.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 59 - 323 (Roll no. 378).
